OOC( I don't mind the senceless violence, that's cool. but the human 
cussing needs to stop. it's not very characteristic of a transformer.)

::Battera::
She decided to go fly and go hunting for a while. She was stil mad 
and wanted to kill something. She stretched her wings and let go of 
the branch. She swooped down, angled her wings and flew upward. She 
had just popped ehr head above the trees when she saw something move 
out of the corner of her eye.  She turned and saw Vulois flying 
towards her direction. "Oh of all the slagging luck today. First he 
beats me, now he's here to kill me I bet. Out to finish me of. Well, 
I'm not letting that left over ball of used motor sludge kill me."
She flew upward and then out, towards the west.  She wanted to see if 
she could out run him. If not, she would then lose him in the canyons 
below in the west sector.  She smiled and thought, catch me if you 
can engine sludge. She flapped her huge wings hard and took off as 
fast as she could. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (Sorry logo, but that's Vulois' whole things. He's all about the 
> violence and the swearing. He deserves it. He's been doing that 
peace 
> things for too long. But I'll be creative.)
> 
> Vulois exited the base and watched the bot fly off. Good for her. 
> She's nothing but Qwest Internet(burn! Eh, Yanshosh, eh?). But than 
> Vulois got an image. He thought he saw something. She was kneeling 
> before him, and they were infront of a big building, and she was 
> crying. He didn't know what this meant, but he intended to find 
out. 
> He flew after the bot.
